mapper.sql: order_id, order_serialNum, product_title,product_image,product_price, term_id, user_id,addr, name,phone,payment_order_id, create_time, pay_time, total_price, is_paid, is_lucky_order,ip_addr,is_active,is_auto_buy,is_point
mapper.select:
select
from db_orders where order_serialNum = #{orderSerialnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_active=1

select
from db_orders where payment_order_id = #{paymentOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_active=1

select
from db_orders where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_active=1

select
from db_orders where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and term_id=#{termId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_paid=1

select A.* from db_orders as A left join db_order_numbers as B on A.order_id=B.order_id where A.term_id=#{termId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_paid=1 group by A.order_id having count(B.number)>0 order by create_time desc

select
from db_orders where is_active=1 and is_paid=0

select A.* from db_orders as A left join db_terms as B on A.term_id = B.term_id
and B.status = 'opened'
and B.status = 'running'
and A.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and A.is_lucky_order = #{isLuckyOrder,jdbcType=BIT}
and A.is_active=1
order by A.create_time desc

select A.* from db_orders as A left join db_order_numbers as B on A.order_id = B.order_id
B.is_lucky_number = 1
and B.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and A.is_active=1
order by A.create_time desc

mapper.update:
update db_orders
order_serialNum = #{orderSerialnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_title = #{productTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_image = #{productImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
term_id = #{termId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_order_id = #{paymentOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_paid = #{isPaid,jdbcType=BIT},
is_lucky_order = #{isLuckyOrder,jdbcType=BIT},
ip_addr = #{ipAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
is_auto_buy = #{isAutoBuy,jdbcType=BIT},
is_point = #{isPoint,jdbcType=BIT},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update db_orders set order_serialNum = #{orderSerialnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_title = #{productTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_image = #{productImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, term_id = #{termId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_order_id = #{paymentOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, is_paid = #{isPaid,jdbcType=BIT}, is_lucky_order = #{isLuckyOrder,jdbcType=BIT}, ip_addr = #{ipAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, is_auto_buy = #{isAutoBuy,jdbcType=BIT}, is_point = #{isPoint,jdbcType=BIT} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
